amendment.description: Amendment sought to grant the VA Secretary improved authorities to hold VA senior executives and employees accountable, protect employees' constitutionally guaranteed due process rights, and protect employees' collective bargaining rights under federal law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walz amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 223 (Roll no. 165).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Walz.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Walz amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 223 (Roll no. 165).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
